name: Simulator Simulator
description:
The controls are WASD for the right hand, OKL; for the left hand and the keys from 1 to 0 for the fingers. Zoom into the screen with the mouse wheel or the up and down arrows.

An AZERTY also version is available on my website here : http://kukuen.supakuruzu.com/en/post/2014/07/14/Simulator-simulator
